game.name: Find My Buddy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Find My Buddy is a casual matching game where a group of characters has been scattered across the screen, and you have to drag them back to their similar-looking buddy. Each unique game mode comes with up to 4 levels of difficulty and new ways to make it more challenging to match the buddies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find My Buddy is a casual matching game where a group of characters has been scattered across the screen, and you have to drag them back to their similar-looking buddy. Each unique game mode comes with up to 4 levels of difficulty and new ways to make it more challenging to match the buddies.
